reviewText:
From Wikipedia:

"Michael Allen "Mike" Adams, was the subject of controversy after posting a blog entry implying a call for violence against proponents of GMO foods, and then allegedly creating another website with a list of names of alleged supporters. He has been accused of using "pseudoscience to sell his lies"

Everybody needs this information. It should be read in schools and universities, but it won't be, because the pharmaceutical companies have infiltrated the board of directors of all mainstream education establishments. This is critical information for your health ! Make sure all your loved ones hear it, this is a wake-up call that sets you on a better path, for life !
